select LAST_INSERT_ID();
insert into checkouts (id, name, started_time, finished_time, num_of_checked_customers, num_of_checked_items) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{numOfCheckedCustomers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numOfCheckedItems,jdbcType=INTEGER})
